definition: to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
person representing the dead (during burial ceremonies)/to put a corpse on display (after execution)/variant of 屍|尸[shi1]/corpse
to reside/to dwell/to live in a place/resident in
unexpectedly/to one's surprise/go so far as to
(of prices, rates etc) to remain high
Anju district of Suining city 遂寧市|遂宁市[Sui4 ning2 shi4], Sichuan
Anju district of Suining city 遂寧市|遂宁市[Sui4 ning2 shi4], Sichuan
to settle (in some city, country etc)/to take up residence

sentences.english: China has 1.3 billion people, more than any other country in the world.
sentences.chinese: 中国有十三亿人口，居全球之冠。

sentences.english: Min merchant group is of an excellent Min merchant tradition and a unique culture.
sentences.chinese: 伴海而居的闽商有着优秀的闽商传统和独特的文化。

sentences.english: India's millionaire population grew 23% last year, the fastest in the world.
sentences.chinese: 去年印度的百万富翁增加了23%，增幅居全球之冠。

sentences.english: Guiyang is on a tributary of the Wu River in the center of the Guizhou province.
sentences.chinese: 贵阳位于乌江支流上，居贵州省的正中央。

sentences.english: Where are you and your team in the value chain of TKE?
sentences.chinese: 在向客户提供的价值链上，你居何处？

sentences.english: Cave Restaurant is the only place under the sun that sells shrimp and scallop dumplings.
sentences.chinese: 出售虾仁弯梳饺的仙人居餐馆，天下独此一家。

sentences.english: Wangcheng is a county in the northeast of Hunan province and across the Xiangjiang River.
sentences.chinese: 湖南省望城县，居湘中东北，跨湘江尾闾。

sentences.english: Hence, a great meritocracy could be created.
sentences.chinese: 所以，一个有能者居之的伟大体制建立了起来。

sentences.english: In fact, in a number of courses I received the highest exam scores in the class.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，有好几门作业我滴成绩居全班第一。“”

sentences.english: So, for a long time Christianity in Guangzhou was in the first place in China.
sentences.chinese: 因此，长期以来，广州的基督教发展居全国之首。

sentences.english: In Southern Song Dynasty, Sima Xi took his wife Wenxiu to visit her parents, whose home in Xiling.
sentences.chinese: 南宋时期，司马樨携妻文秀拜访岳父母，居西泠。

sentences.english: Once made equal to man, woman becomes his superior.
sentences.chinese: 一旦使之与男人看齐的话，女人就会居其上了。

sentences.english: The local people's response to the new security measures was enthusiastic.
sentences.chinese: 当地居平易近对新的安全措施反应热烈。

sentences.english: A green gown, the fog blurred, a beauty on the water.
sentences.chinese: 绿草萋萋，白雾迷离，有位佳人靠水而居。

sentences.english: People are social creatures who cannot live in total isolation.
sentences.chinese: 人是社会的动物，不能离群而索居。

sentences.english: There are 178 countries and areas in the index. China ranks 31.
sentences.chinese: 这一指数调查了178个国家和地区，中国居31位。

definition: leading/in first place/top of the list
to rank (number 1, or third last etc)/to be among (those who are in a particular group)
Anju district of Suining city 遂寧市|遂宁市[Sui4 ning2 shi4], Sichuan
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
long-term resident/permanent residence/eternalism (permanence of soul, Sanskrit śāśvata-vāda)
ducal title meaning lord of 10,000 households/also translated as Marquis
